dc:title: Housing
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Advocates the small is beautiful, personalist, house of hospitality approach to the homeless, rather that the big impersonal approach of the municipal lodging houses.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 180 1974-12-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
